\begin{document}

\maketitle
\tableofcontents
\phantomsection\label{index::doc}


Contents:


\bigskip\hrule{}\bigskip


This package is an implementation of Viterbi Algorithm, Forward algorithm and the Baum Welch Algorithm. The computations are done via matrices to improve the algorithm runtime. Package \textbf{hidden\_markov} is tested with Python version 2.7 and Python version 3.5.


\chapter{Installation}
\label{index:hidden-markov-model}\label{index:installation}
To install this package, clone this \href{https://github.com/Red-devilz/hidden\_markov}{repo} and from the root directory run:

\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYGZdl{} python setup.py install
\end{Verbatim}

An alternative way to install the package \textbf{hidden\_markov}, is to use pip or easy\_install, i.e. run the command:

\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYGZdl{} pip install hidden\PYGZus{}markov
\end{Verbatim}

Unfamiliar with pip? Checkout \href{https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/installing/}{this link} to install pip.

\label{index:usage}
Check this link(TODO) for a basic overview of Hidden markov models.
